bugs.summary: [PDF Viewer] Canvas transparency broken with HWA enabled
Specific page in print preview, the entire Firefox window will flash and blank
Silence "ATTENTION: default value of option mesa_glthread overridden by environment." warning when not needed
Change the nursery's object/string fix-up lists to add to the front
[MIPS64] Failed to build JS shell for mips64 platform (lowerForALUInt64)
iframes that span multiple pages don't draw in print preview with fission
[Wayland] Use xdg_activation_v1 to set window focus
Implement QR code/Email link UX in "More from Mozilla" preferences panel for 96
Reformat recent changes to the Google coding style
